entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow Offset Style breaks Android in Release mode #24601
  • DeviceIdiom detects notebook as tablet #24596
  • Class Libraries throw Exception when building for MacCatalyst #24595
  • Can Webview2(Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Controls.WebView2) expose ZoomFactor property? #24593
  • Cannot publish to App Store . IPA generation error #24591

Closed

  • Scrollview content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled. #24467
  • [Android] ResfreshView IsEnabled not working #19897
    .NET 8 SR9
  • RefreshView IsEnabled not working (iOS/Android) #24228
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items #23220
    Backlog
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme doesn't change on changing UserAppTheme #24558
  • [iOS] "Could not find a part of the path" Firebase CloudMessaging #23829

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Fix SafeArea adjustments" #24600
  • [Draft] Restore Localization #24599
  • Renamed Github5623.cs in TestCases.HostApp to Github5623.xaml.cs #24598
  • Use the IsRefreshing property directly #24597
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [C] Allow OnIdiom/OnPlatform to return a Binding #24594

Merged

  • RefreshView IsEnabled enhancements #24290
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • Revert "Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false" #24588
    area-controls-shell
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24523
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-theme

Updated

  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, do-not-merge, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, area-controls-editor
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • [IOS] - Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24567
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Fix App Theme Binding For Non Elements #24465
    community ✨, area-theme
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [C] avoid concurrent access to _values #24579
    area-xaml
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fix for the Nested Entry View In A Frame Causes Crash #24543
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
